name: Arachno Zoonosis (Sauna Studios, NeitherNathan, Leticia Moeller, PlaayL)
name_original: Arachno Zoonosis (Sauna Studios, NeitherNathan, Leticia Moeller, PlaayL)
description:
Are you badass enough to grab this shotgun and rip some spider legs in your new game Jam game inspired by Doom?

In this game, made for the 2020 Epic MegaJam, you are based on a space station, ready to go home, but you are not done yet, there are some hundreds of giant spiders left, do you have what it takes to kill them all?
